channel.title: Bologna on Soliprem
channel.description: Recent content in Bologna on Soliprem

item.title: TIL that San'Orsola is pretty much the size of a small town
item.description: Easter night I had the pleasure to visit the Sant’Orsola policlinic’s ER. On the way there, I had to cross the entire hostpital’s grounds. I must say, they really are impressive. It felt like walking through a campus mixed with a park. Really nice.
